languages.text: "Мир, лишенный связи с соседними системами и инфраструктурой Простора, может полагаться только на свои силы — которые порой весьма ограничены. К примеру, у Януса нет собственного флота. Пираты, культисты, еретики, ксеносы — кто угодно может избрать беззащитный мир добычей. Потеря связи также угрожает и вашему положению — без мощного протектората за плечами {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} слабнет с каждым днем".

traits.locale_text: "Мир, лишенный связи с соседними системами и инфраструктурой Простора, может полагаться только на свои силы — которые порой весьма ограничены. К примеру, у Януса нет собственного флота. Пираты, культисты, еретики, ксеносы — кто угодно может избрать беззащитный мир добычей. Потеря связи также угрожает и вашему положению — без мощного протектората за плечами {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} слабнет с каждым днем".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "A world deprived of connection to its neighbouring systems and the Koronus Expanse's infrastructure can only rely on itself — and their capabilities are often limited. For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone could prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is a threat to your position. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with no protectorate to back them is one that grows weaker by the day."
languages.original_text: "Мир, лишенный связи с соседними системами и инфраструктурой Простора, может полагаться только на свои силы — которые порой весьма ограничены. К примеру, у Януса нет собственного флота. Пираты, культисты, еретики, ксеносы — кто угодно может избрать беззащитный мир добычей. Потеря связи также угрожает и вашему положению — без мощного протектората за плечами {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} слабнет с каждым днем".

traits.locale_text: "A world deprived of connection to its neighboring systems and the Koronus infrastructure can only rely on itself — and their capabilities are often limited. For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone can prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is threatening your position. A Rogue Trader with no merchant empire to back him is growing weaker day after day."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A world deprived of connection to its neighboring systems and the Koronus Expanse's infrastructure can only rely on itself — and their capabilities are often limited. For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone could prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is a threat to your position. A Rogue Trader with no trade empire to back them is one that grows weaker by the day."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone could prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is a threat to your position. A Rogue Trader with no trade empire to back them is one that grows weaker by the day."

traits.locale_text: "A world deprived of connection to its neighbouring systems and the Koronus Expanse's infrastructure can only rely on itself — and their capabilities are often limited. For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone could prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is a threat to your position. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with no protectorate to back them is one that grows weaker by the day."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A world deprived of connection to its neighbouring systems and the Koronus Expanse's infrastructure can only rely on itself — and their capabilities are often limited. For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone could prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is a threat to your position. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with no protectorate to back them is one that grows weaker by the day."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Un mundo privado de contacto con los sistemas colindantes y la infraestructura de la Extensión de Koronus solo puede depender de sí mismo, y por lo general sus capacidades son limitadas. Por ejemplo, Janus carece de flota propia. El planeta sería presa fácil para piratas, cultos, herejes, xenos... para cualquiera. La pérdida de comunicaciones es una amenaza a su posición. Un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} sin protectorado que le apoye es alguien cuya posición se debilita a cada día que pasa».
languages.original_text: "A world deprived of connection to its neighbouring systems and the Koronus Expanse's infrastructure can only rely on itself — and their capabilities are often limited. For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone could prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is a threat to your position. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with no protectorate to back them is one that grows weaker by the day."

traits.locale_text: «Un mundo privado de contacto con los sistemas colindantes y la infraestructura de la Extensión de Koronus solo puede depender de sí mismo, y por lo general sus capacidades son limitadas. Por ejemplo, Janus carece de flota propia. El planeta sería presa fácil para piratas, cultos, herejes, xenos... para cualquiera. La pérdida de comunicaciones es una amenaza a su posición. Un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} sin protectorado que le apoye es alguien cuya posición se debilita a cada día que pasa».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “如果某个世界被剥夺了通讯能力，无法与相邻星系与科罗努斯扩区的基础设施取得联系的话，那个世界便只能自给自足，而我们的世界往往力量有限。比如说，加努斯没有自己的舰队。一旦海盗、邪教徒、异端分子，或是异形出现，所有人都可以肆意蹂躏这颗无助的行星。如果您失去了与这些世界的联系，您的地位也会受到威胁。如果某个{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}失去了麾下行星的支持，那个王朝的实力就会日渐衰弱。”
languages.original_text: "A world deprived of connection to its neighbouring systems and the Koronus Expanse's infrastructure can only rely on itself — and their capabilities are often limited. For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone could prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is a threat to your position. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with no protectorate to back them is one that grows weaker by the day."

traits.locale_text: “如果某个世界被剥夺了通讯能力，无法与相邻星系与科罗努斯星域的基础设施取得联系的话，那个世界便只能自给自足，而我们的世界往往力量有限。比如说，加努斯没有自己的舰队。一旦海盗、邪教徒、异端分子，或是异形出现，所有人都可以肆意蹂躏这颗无助的行星。如果您失去了与这些世界的联系，您的地位也会受到威胁。如果某个{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}失去了麾下行星的支持，那个王朝的实力就会日渐衰弱。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「近隣のシステムやコロヌス・エクスパンスのインフラとの繋がりを絶たれた惑星は、その惑星だけでやっていくしかありませんーー大抵は機能が制限されます。たとえば、ヤヌスには惑星独自の艦隊がありません。海賊、魔女団、異端者、異種族ーー無力な惑星は、あらゆる脅威から狙われかねないのです。連絡が途絶えれば、あなたの立場は脅かされます。保護領を持たない{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}は、日増しに力が弱っていくものです」
languages.original_text: "A world deprived of connection to its neighbouring systems and the Koronus Expanse's infrastructure can only rely on itself — and their capabilities are often limited. For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone could prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is a threat to your position. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with no protectorate to back them is one that grows weaker by the day."

traits.locale_text: 「近隣のシステムやコロヌス・エクスパンスのインフラとの繋がりを絶たれた惑星は、その惑星だけでやっていくしかありませんーー大抵は機能が制限されます。たとえば、Janus には惑星独自の艦隊がありません。海賊、魔女団、異端者、異種族ーー無力な惑星は、あらゆる脅威から狙われかねないのです。連絡が途絶えれば、あなたの立場は脅かされます。保護領を持たない{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}は、日増しに力が弱っていくものです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Eine Welt ohne Verbindung zu ihren Nachbarsystemen und der Infrastruktur der Koronus-Ausdehnung ist auf sich selbst angewiesen – und die Möglichkeiten dabei sind oftmals begrenzt. Janus hat zum Beispiel keine eigene Flotte. Piraten, Kultisten, Ketzer, Xenos – jeder kann den hilflosen Planeten überfallen. Der Verlust der Kommunikation ist eine Bedrohung für Eure Position. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin}{/g} ohne Protektorat als Stütze wird mit jedem Tag schwächer."
languages.original_text: "A world deprived of connection to its neighbouring systems and the Koronus Expanse's infrastructure can only rely on itself — and their capabilities are often limited. For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone could prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is a threat to your position. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with no protectorate to back them is one that grows weaker by the day."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Welt ohne Verbindung zu ihren Nachbarsystemen und der Infrastruktur der Koronus-Ausdehnung ist auf sich selbst angewiesen – und die Möglichkeiten dabei sind oftmals begrenzt. Janus hat zum Beispiel keine eigene Flotte. Piraten, Kultisten, Ketzer, Xenos – jeder kann den hilflosen Planeten überfallen. Der Verlust der Kommunikation ist eine Bedrohung für Eure Position. {mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin} ohne Protektorat als Stütze wird mit jedem Tag schwächer."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Un monde sans liaison avec les systèmes voisins et l'infrastructure des Étendues de Koronus se retrouve livré à lui-même, avec des capacités bien souvent limitées. Par exemple, Janus n'a pas sa propre flotte. Les pirates, les cultistes, les hérétiques, les xénos... N'importe qui pourrait s'en prendre à une planète sans défense. De plus, l'interruption des communications met votre statut en péril, car un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g} est considérablement affaibli sans le soutien de son protectorat. »
languages.original_text: "A world deprived of connection to its neighbouring systems and the Koronus Expanse's infrastructure can only rely on itself — and their capabilities are often limited. For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone could prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is a threat to your position. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with no protectorate to back them is one that grows weaker by the day."

traits.locale_text: « Un monde sans liaison avec les systèmes voisins et l'infrastructure des Étendues de Koronus se retrouve livré à lui-même, avec des capacités bien souvent limitées. Par exemple, Janus n'a pas sa propre flotte. Les pirates, les cultistes, les hérétiques, les xénos... N'importe qui pourrait s'en prendre à une planète sans défense. De plus, l'interruption des communications met votre statut en péril, car un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g} est considérablement affaibli sans le soutien de son protectorat. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Komşu sistemleriyle ve Koronus Enginliği'nin altyapısıyla iletişimi yitiren bir dünya, kendi eline bakmak zorunda kalır. Yapabildikleri de çoğu kez sınırlıdır. Örneğin Janus'un kendisine ait bir filosu yoktur. Savunmasız kaldığında korsanlar, tarikatçılar, kâfirler, zenolar, kısacası herkes orayı hedef alacaktır. İletişimin yitirilmesi, mevkiniz için de tehdit oluşturur. Protektorasından mahrum kalan bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, günbegün zayıflar."
languages.original_text: "A world deprived of connection to its neighbouring systems and the Koronus Expanse's infrastructure can only rely on itself — and their capabilities are often limited. For example, Janus does not have a fleet of its own. Pirates, cultists, heretics, xenos — anyone could prey on the helpless planet. The loss of communication is a threat to your position. A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with no protectorate to back them is one that grows weaker by the day."

traits.locale_text: "Komşu sistemleriyle ve Koronus Enginliği'nin altyapısıyla iletişimi yitiren bir dünya, tamamen kendine bel bağlayabilir hâle gelir ve her bir dünyanın yapabildiği şeyler sınırlıdır. Örneğin Janus'un kendisine ait bir filosu yoktur. Savunmasız kaldığında korsanlar, tarikatçılar, kâfirler, zenolar, hepsi orayı hedef alacaktır. İletişimi yitirmek, sahip olduğunuz konum için bir tehlike demektir. Protektorası tarafından desteklenmeyen bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, günbegün zayıflar."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
